titleStmt.title: A letter from a person of quality residing in Kinsale, with an attestation of the officers of the Parliaments army in Munster, in vindication of the Lord of Inchiquin, Lord President of that province Also, another letter from Colonel William Jephson, relating the present state and condition of Ireland. Published by speciall command.
titleStmt.author: B. S.
Jephson, William, 1615?-1659?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wright at the Kings Head in the Old Bayley.,

notesStmt.note: Consists of three letters, the first of which is signed: B.S.; the second is signed by 32 men; the third is signed: William Jephson.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in the Old Bayley.
